MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the LL62 postcode area of Bodorgan. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1AM due to repairs required on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30AM. We will make every effort to contact you if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 00:35AM on 10 November 2020.
